body.header: Now you can compare your performance with Dimitris'. Look at the questions below and try answering them, then listen to Dimitris doing the same.

section.p: Is it worth the huge amount of money that is spent on it? You and Dimitris have both probably answered some questions better than others. In one case, Dimitris could have given more examples. He sometimes has problems with vocabulary and grammar, and is maybe a little unclear at times. Think about your own weak areas in this task and what you can do to improve them.
